yes: Are you ready to leave this marble?
dynamic_line.no: You look like one of my niece's lab assistants.

responses.text: Can I do anything for you?  Are you as crazy as your niece?
I'm going on my way now.

dynamic_line: Are you here because you are morally flexible and willing to take questionable directions from obviously insane people.

responses.text: Your niece is looking for you.
How did you survive the Cataclysm?
Quite the setup you have here.

dynamic_line: This is a Whately family property.  And you are an intruder.

responses.text: I think there's been a mistake.

dynamic_line: She's always been so precocious!  I knew that she was going places and we'd see great things from her.

responses.text: She needed a lab assistant, do you?

dynamic_line: The Whately family has been part of the fabric of New England since before the Revolutionary War.  And I have been growing our interests for the last few decades.
Muttering 'They whispered of a prison.  Ragnarok engine humming.  Wrapped they in darkness dreaming'.  He shakes himself, 'Anyway it looks like something woke up, for at least a little bit.'
This is a time of great danger and great opportunity and it must not be squandered.

dialogue.describe: I need 4 self healing polymers from wherever you can find them.
dialogue.offer: My experiments are at a critical point.  Could you find about… 4 self healing polymers for me?
dialogue.accepted: Don't forget to tell me when you have them.
dialogue.rejected: Then why are you even here?  Just let me know if you reconsider.
dialogue.success: My niece shared her research, show me if it works.
dialogue.failure: Put a stopper in death?  No you never will.

name: Making Connections
description: I need a neurosynaptic interface matrix.

dialogue.describe: I need one neurosynaptic interface matrix.
dialogue.offer: I want to test something and I need a viable version to reverse engineer.  Bring me one neurosynaptic interface matrix.
dialogue.accepted: Without this all that's possible is 'Ye liveliest awfulness'.
dialogue.rejected: You'd give up a new world just to bring back Foodplace!
dialogue.advice: You're going to have to hunt this down.
dialogue.success_lie: How could you possibly lie to me about an object you have not put in my hands.
dialogue.failure: Do you have any head cybernetics?  I could possibly salvage one out of your skull.

dialogue.offer: I know that one of the corporations were creating a so called Alpha mutagen.  I need three doses to prepare the body.
dialogue.advice: If you can't make it yourself go hit up a lab.  Be prepared for anything in there.
dialogue.inquire: Did you get taller since the last time I saw you?
dialogue.success: I've got something more potent for you this time.
dialogue.success_lie: Lies and the lying liars who tell them.
dialogue.failure: You are keeping me from my experiments.  Would you like to become one?

name: Broken Cyborg
description: We need a strong base for our experiment.

dialogue.describe: I need an unconscious broken cyborg.  They are already brain dead so it won't be murder.
dialogue.offer: If you go to labs you should find some broken cyborg experiments.  Bring an inactive one to me.
dialogue.accepted: Are you ready for a little necromancy?
dialogue.rejected: I'm telling you they're already brain dead.
dialogue.advice: Look for surgical centers inside the labs.
dialogue.inquire: So where are my fresh parts?
dialogue.success: I've got something more potent for you this time.
dialogue.success_lie: Lies and the lying liars who tell them.
dialogue.failure: What kinds of body modifications do you have?

name: A-Mi-go, You-go find me some brains
//: Sometime consider changing the end effect of this item and making the test site it's own quest.

dialogue.describe: I need some brains, but brains that are still living.  We've got our own brain blasters, but I won't risk them in experiments.
dialogue.offer: If this works I may be able to give some of these poor souls bodies again.  Six should do.
dialogue.accepted: I knew I could count on your generosity.
dialogue.rejected: I would have given you the title of Whately family Igor.
dialogue.advice: Brain blasters, that's what I call them.  Some kind of automated weapon system the mi-go use.
dialogue.inquire: They speak sometimes.  I wonder if they still think.
dialogue.success: Go somewhere, far away, and then connect the power system.  Come back and tell me how things went.
dialogue.failure: I can't be Dr. Frankenstein unless you get me these.
